name: Bevy City
description:
Originally forked from Game4all's vx_bevy, Bevy City is an infinite voxel city procedurally generated at runtime. Spawn pigeons if you get lonely. Placeholder name btw, don't sue me.

Follow development ▶ https://twitter.com/mungbungo

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Debug: F3
  • Fly: Space
  • Toggle Cursor: Escape
